metadata.title: CVE-2023-4359 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in App Launcher in Google Chrome on iOS priorto 116.0.5845.96 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof elements ofthe security UI via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
